message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for you, considering the value it holds for your business. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  How about we split the difference and settle on $950,000? I believe this price reflects the value of the product for both of us.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with $950,000. I was thinking more in the range of $920,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting the best deal possible.
